data: Monica Allen Monica Allen Ph.D., Harvard University, 2016 Office: Mayer Hall Addition 3611 mtallen@physics.ucsd.edu Our group performs research in the area of experimental condensed matter physics.  We aim to combine scanning probe microscopy with electronic transport measurements to study quantum materials and utilize them for emerging technologies, such as next-generation computing. To explore our research, please visit https://allen.physics.ucsd.edu/
